processing.title: Processing Assessment
processing.subtitle: Please wait while we analyze your responses
processing.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your assessment and prepare your personalized results.
processing.takeMoments: This should only take a few moments.

costAnalysis.title: Cost Analysis
costAnalysis.description: This analysis quantifies potential annual savings from improving your cloud native maturity.
costAnalysis.savingsDescription: Based on closing maturity gaps across all categories
costAnalysis.noDataDescription: We need assessment data to calculate potential cost savings. Please complete the assessment with specific answers.
costAnalysis.quickWinsDescription: Highest ROI improvement opportunities with immediate business impact
costAnalysis.disclaimer: This analysis provides estimates based on industry data and your assessment. Actual results may vary.

costAreaDescriptions.IC: Cloud and infrastructure expenses including compute, storage, network, and software licenses.
costAreaDescriptions.OE: Costs related to operations teams, manual processes, and operational overhead.
costAreaDescriptions.DP: Developer productivity costs including development time, tools, and inefficiencies.
costAreaDescriptions.IM: Incident-related costs including downtime, response time, recovery, and reputation damage.
costAreaDescriptions.TM: Opportunity costs from delayed products and features reaching the market.

implementationRoadmap.title: Implementation Roadmap
implementationRoadmap.subtitle: A phased approach to improve your cloud native maturity
implementationRoadmap.approachDescription: This roadmap is arranged in a logical sequence to build cloud native capabilities incrementally. Start with Phase 1 recommendations to establish a foundation, then progress to more advanced initiatives in later phases.
implementationRoadmap.categoriesNote: Note: Categories highlighted in blue were not covered in your assessment.

phases.title: Implementation Phases

short_term.title: Phase 1: Short-term
short_term.description: Quick wins and immediate improvements that establish the foundation.
short_term.detailedDescription: These recommendations focus on quick wins and immediate improvements that will establish the foundation for your cloud native journey.

medium_term.title: Phase 2: Medium-term
medium_term.description: Building on short-term improvements and expanding cloud native adoption.
medium_term.detailedDescription: These recommendations build on the short-term improvements and focus on expanding cloud native adoption across the organization.

long_term.title: Phase 3: Long-term
long_term.description: Transformational changes to elevate to advanced cloud native maturity.
long_term.detailedDescription: These recommendations represent transformational changes that will elevate your organization to advanced cloud native maturity.

no_phase_selected.title: No Phase Selected
no_phase_selected.description: Please select a phase from the roadmap to view detailed recommendations.

phases.note: Note: Categories highlighted in blue were not covered in your assessment.

no_recommendation_selected.title: No Recommendation Selected
no_recommendation_selected.description: Please select a recommendation to view detailed information.

fallbackSteps.research: Research and evaluate appropriate tools and approaches
fallbackSteps.plan: Create detailed implementation plan with stakeholders
fallbackSteps.implement: Implement solution in a controlled environment
fallbackSteps.test: Test and validate functionality and performance
fallbackSteps.rollout: Roll out to broader organization with appropriate training
fallbackSteps.document: Document processes and create operational procedures

fallbackCriteria.timeline: Implementation is completed within the specified timeline
fallbackCriteria.adoption: The solution is adopted by relevant teams and stakeholders
fallbackCriteria.metrics: Key metrics show improvement in the target area
fallbackCriteria.documentation: Documentation and operational procedures are in place
fallbackCriteria.scores: Relevant assessment scores improve by at least 15 points

topRecommendations.title: Top Priority Recommendations
topRecommendations.description: These recommendations provide the most immediate value in your cloud native journey

completeAssessment: Please complete an assessment to view your implementation roadmap.

costSavings.title: Annual Potential Cost Savings
costSavings.noEstimate: We cannot estimate cost savings without assessment data.
costSavings.completeAssessment: Please complete the assessment with specific answers to get cost savings estimates.

focusAreas.title: Focus Areas
focusAreas.description: Key categories to prioritize for effective improvement

improvementOpportunities.title: Top Improvement Opportunities
improvementOpportunities.description: Key areas with the highest potential for improvement

criticalIssues.title: Critical Issues
criticalIssues.description: These issues represent the most significant gaps in cloud native maturity that should be prioritized.

comparisonTab.title: Industry Comparison
comparisonTab.subtitle: See how your organization compares to industry leaders and benchmarks
comparisonTab.dataSources: Data sources: Google Cloud State of DevOps, The Hackett Group, CNCF, Gartner, Red Hat, McKinsey
comparisonTab.gapAnalysisDescription: The chart shows categories with the largest absolute point gaps between your organization and industry leaders, representing your biggest improvement opportunities.

trailMap.title: Cloud Native Trail Map
trailMap.subtitle: Your cloud native journey visualization
trailMap.completeAssessment: Please complete an assessment to view your cloud native trail map.
trailMap.insightsDescription: Based on your organization's assessment results and context, we recommend focusing on these areas in the following order:
trailMap.waitingInsights: Personalized journey insights will appear here after your assessment is processed.
trailMap.journeyDescription: This trail map visualizes your organization's progress along the cloud native journey, highlighting completed milestones and next steps in each category.
trailMap.selectCategoryPrompt: Please select a category from the trail map to view detailed information.

milestone1.label: Cloud strategy alignment
milestone1.description: Aligning cloud initiatives with business goals

milestone3.label: Strategic innovation
milestone3.description: Leveraging cloud for new business capabilities

milestone1.label: Multi-cloud strategy
milestone1.description: Defining approach to multiple cloud providers

milestone3.label: AI-native architecture
milestone3.description: Fully integrated AI/ML in cloud-native systems

categories.business_value_strategy: Business Value and Cloud Native Strategy

foundations_culture.keyInsight: 2024 State-of-DevOps: high-performers score 0.8 on culture index; median sits just under 0.6

business_value_strategy.description: Cloud value road-mapping for edge-AI services
business_value_strategy.keyInsight: Hackett Group: only 42% have value-roadmap; top quartile show 25% faster release cadence

application_architecture.description: Large-scale mobile super-app on micro-services & gRPC
application_architecture.keyInsight: ~50% of orgs still monolithic; leaders hit 75–80% micro-/service-mesh adoption

app_migration_modernization.keyInsight: < 45% of workloads modernised by 2024; cloud leaders cross 70%

container_infrastructure.description: Runs 10,000+ K8s nodes incl. stateful edge clusters
container_infrastructure.keyInsight: 60% production K8s today; top cohort fully containerised

cicd_practices.description: GitOps CD tool OSS-ed; internal unified pipeline
cicd_practices.keyInsight: 57% automate > half of pipeline; elite automate ≈ 80%

dora_metrics.description: Publishes lead-time / MTTR in engineering blog ('Golden Path')
dora_metrics.keyInsight: Elite performers (26%) hit 85-plus composite, median is 'medium' (≈60)

security_compliance.description: Zero-Trust deployment with Zscaler across global workforce
security_compliance.keyInsight: AI-driven/shift-left orgs slash risk; majority still reactive (≈50)

infrastructure_platform.description: Internal developer platform on GKE + Spanner
infrastructure_platform.keyInsight: IaC adoption ~55%; platform-engineering leaders report > 75% IaC coverage

observability.keyInsight: 76% have central observability; only 25% rate practices 'advanced' (> 0.75)

finops_cost_management.description: K8s cost-insights via open-source Kubecost fork
finops_cost_management.keyInsight: 58% automate anomaly detection; high-performers score ~0.8 in FinOps maturity index

operations_resilience.description: GameDay chaos drills; MTTR < 5 min avg
operations_resilience.keyInsight: Incident automation still sub-60%; leaders with chaos-engineering score ~0.78

multicloud_hybrid_governance.description: Managed hybrid governance for Toyota-Woven Planet
multicloud_hybrid_governance.keyInsight: Only 48% have unified policy controls; mature orgs hit mid-70s

ai_ml_integration.description: In-cluster inferencing for edge retail cameras
ai_ml_integration.keyInsight: 55% pilot AI in ≤3 functions; 'AI high-performers' (12%) score > 0.75 on adoption + ROI
